ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] I lust for more power-
ygData.msgSnippet: I had the same problem as you. Forever I played EQ on a Celeron 400, 32 meg vid card and 384 megs of memory. I recently upgraded to a new machine though. While
ygData.messageBody:
I had the same problem as you. Forever I played EQ on
a Celeron 400, 32 meg vid card and 384 megs of memory.
I recently upgraded to a new machine though. While
it's hardly top of the line, I feel like I can
actually move now. It's a celeron 1.7, 64 meg card and
768 megs of memory.

Hang in there, you'll get your machine one day. :)

Mel

--- mlockridge01 <MLockridge01@...> wrote:
>
> Techno-envey and power lust have me big time. I
> still limp along on a
> nearly three year old etower 600mh rig with limited
> memory and graphics.
>
> To cruise the Bazaar with hardly a hitch. To visit
> POK and be able to
> move in a normal fashion. Ah.
>

>
> Barto Proudfoot
>
>


=====
~~~~~~~~~

And on the eighth day God said, "O.K. Murphy. You take over."
